original_text: “Therefore say: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Although I sent them far away among the nations and scattered them among the countries, yet for a little while I have been a sanctuary for them in the countries where they have gone.’
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 말하기를 주 여호와의 말씀에 내가 비록 그들을 멀리 이방인 가운데로 쫓아내어 여러 나라에 흩었으나 그들이 도달한 나라들에서 내가 잠깐 그들에게 성소가 되리라 하셨다 하고

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says
Although I sent them far away among the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 열국 중 멀리 보냈을지라도

sentences.original_text: and scattered them among the countries
I have been a sanctuary for them
in the countries where they have gone
